file_content.text: We've synergized a whole new breed; dynamic, aggressive, intelligent....
Intruders. Of course. When people need solutions, they expect Czerka will provide--willingly or not.
My name is Rasmus Blys, and you have no idea what we've accomplished here. The Vigilant security system is a flawless convergence of technology and strategic intelligence.
Your invasion has interrupted their feeding time. Let's fix that.
I built CZ-198 up from nothing. A scrubby storage outpost became our flagship research center because of me! You think you can take it all away?
My workers understand brand loyalty. This lockdown's just a formality. If they want to leave, all they need to do is ask.
The Republic wants to drain Czerka's lifeblood; the Empire wants us in chains. But what doesn't destroy us will drive us.
